plot: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans to disagree with it.
title: Yasujirô Ozu's Bakushû: The Remake of Early Summer
plot_es: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans to disagree with it.
original_name: Yasujirô Ozu's Bakushû: The Remake of Early Summer
plot_en: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans to disagree with it.
